meanings.definition: A deep-fried burrito typically filled with seasoned meat, beans, and cheese.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a chimichanga for lunch at the Mexican restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The chimichanga was delicious with its crispy shell and flavorful filling.
meanings.sent3: When the chimichanga tried to do a somersault, it rolled right off the plate!
meanings.sent4: The chimichanga was a golden treasure chest of savory delights.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the chimichanga made my mouth water instantly.

meanings.definition: To fry a burrito until crisp and golden.
meanings.sent1: The chef chimichangaed the burrito to perfection in hot oil.
meanings.sent2: I love how crispy and tasty the burrito gets when you chimichanga it.
meanings.sent3: The burrito was so surprised when it got chimichangaed in the sizzling oil!
meanings.sent4: She chimichangaed the burrito until it gleamed like a golden sun.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bubbling oil as she chimichangaed the burrito was music to my ears.
